Title: Chief Information Officer
Headline: Karen Rogers was Appointed as Chief Information Officer at State of Michigan
What Happened: Lansing; MI-based State of Michigan hired Karen Rogers as Chief Information Officer
About Person: Karen Rogers previously held various technology roles in Government industry.
About Company: Michigan is the eighth most populous state in the United States. It has the longest freshwater coastline of any political subdivision in the world; being bounded by four of the five Great Lakes; plus Lake Saint Clair.
